subject: Football
lead_paragraph: When D’Brickashaw Ferguson, then a rookie with the Jets, began to lose weight last season, the worry was that the blocker protecting quarterback Chad Pennington’s blind side was wearing down.
snippet: When D’Brickashaw Ferguson, then a rookie with the Jets, began to lose weight last season, the worry was that the blocker protecting quarterback Chad Pennington’s blind side was wearing down.
